oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bob Beiers Job No. 18961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Accounting; Butler, Carl; Butler, Pearl; Hatch Show Print (Firm);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Typed purchase order for Bob Beiers requesting 50 2-color window cards for the Grand Ole Opry Shows featuring Carl and Pearl Buttler at Margaretta High School in Castalia, Ohio on Sunday, August 7, 1977 at 1pm, 4 pm, and 8 pm. Cost of poster order totaled $32.00.
